Name: Natti
About the game: Natti is roguelike tower defense game unfolds in the Otherworld from Korean folktales. Place defense towers and take down dangerous villains without missing a single one. Far, far away, there was a land called the Otherworld. There was a race of animals called Natti living in peace. the one day, the gates of hell opened and a group of monsters invaded. All kinds of monsters and ghosts are taking over the Otherworld and causing chaos. With solid defense towers and equipment, can you recover the Otherworld from the evil, protect the treausure, and lock the Hell’s gate? A variety of distinctive worlds Take look the beautiful world before it was taken over by monsters: from the forest where Sage walk through the Soul River to the miraculous rocky mountain. Invest in strategic vantage points and build defense towers on each map to take down dangerous villains without missing a single one. Procedurally generated world map The road to the Otherworld changes with each challenge! Defeat the monsters and protect the Otherworld in various ways through new strategies and choices. Structure with oriental beauty Various oriental structures transforms beautifully in appearance along combat functions as they upgrade. Numerous equipment to strengthen the defense towers From a want that fires a beam to a crossbow that shots repeatedly at the same time, equip the defense towers with gears to respond to different situation. Strategic play with heroes Heroes with special abilities are waiting for your command. Strengthen your heroes and upgrade their skills to strategically utilize them at the right time. Diverse monsters in Korean folktales You can protect the Otherworld by defeating the enemy who jumped out of the Hell’s gate. Confront the cute, but also creepy classic monsters from Korean tradition. The more striking boss fight Depending on the each world, the terrifying boss appears in a new way. Build your defense strategy with a hero and defense towers, and then defeat the boss.
